price: በእውነት የመጨረሻይቱን ዓለም (ኹኔታ) ማወቃቸው ተሟላን አይደለም እነርሱ ከእርሷ በመጠራጠር ውስጥ ናቸው፡፡ በእውነትም እነርሱ ከእርሷ ዕውሮች ናቸው፡፡
arabic: بَلِ ٱدَّٰرَكَ عِلۡمُهُمۡ فِي ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِۚ بَلۡ هُمۡ فِي شَكّٖ مِّنۡهَاۖ بَلۡ هُم مِّنۡهَا عَمُونَ

version.title: Amharic translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Amharic by Muhammad Sadeq and Muhammad Ath-Thany Habib. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: bali iddāraka ʿil'muhum fī al-ākhirati bal hum fī shakkin min'hā bal hum min'hā ʿamūna
